text: John F. Pickering of Haiti received a US patent for his design of an airship.
Following the USSR, the United States put its first man into orbit. John Glenn piloted the Mercury-Atlas 6 Friendship 7 spacecraft to a successful conclusion of the mission.
A Soviet Proton launcher boosted the base block of the Mir space station into orbit.
Apple's first iPod Mini arrived in Apple retail stores and online. It was the first size variation of the iPod.
Sony announced the PlayStation 4 without giving out price or even showing what the hardware would look like.
